Package webspider.gui

Class Summary
CrawlPanel The panel outputting crawler information
IndexerPanel The panel outputting indexer information
Logger A globbal applicatin logger that outputs to the graphical user interface as well as to the command line
MainGUI The main graphical user interface, it intitalizes the elements, build the componenets and packs tha panels, then sets everthing to be visible can be turned off or on.
OptionsPanel An options panel to ask for user input
SearchPanel Class to create Panels for search functions
